posts.post_content:
Hi...

Could anybody tell me anything about this postcard - July 1st Game between Columbus and Toledo? What year? I would like to get an idea of this origin and current valuation.

Attached to this post are two (2) images showing the postcard - both the front and reverse sides.

Thank you for your assistance in guiding me.

BronxNative.

This postcard was from 1906 with a team postcard that was part of a 2 card set from the Columbus dispatch. The 1906 columbus senators won the american association championships but lost the junior world series and also won the aa championship in 1905 and 1907.
Here is the second card from the set:
